name: The Marina Counseling Center
description: The Marina Counseling Center provides counseling to adults, couples, families, and adolescents. Fees are determined based on client income and life circumstances. The Center has two locations: - Marina location (handicap inaccessible: three flights of stairs) - Mission location (accessible to all):
